title: Castle Doom
description: Colonel Len Hamilton never once won a game of Dungeons and Dragons against his two sons. Fate now has him playing a game that's a horrific shadow of those rec-room afternoons. It's different and yet there is a demon, a dragon, trolls, torture and a deadly puzzle. If Len can't solve that puzzle not only will he never see his boys or their beautiful mother again but mankind's world full of science and learning is doomed.
author: Tabitha Baumander
